name: The Antilovable Robots
description:
A game for the game jam Goedware Game Jam 5, with the theme of Love, Death & Robots.

This game is heavily inspired by Call Of Duty's Zombies mode. In this game you try to survive the robots who keep coming after you. Kill them with love for score which can be used to buy guns, buy ammo, buy doors and perks so that you can potentially live a little longer.

Controls

WASD - Movement

Mouse - Aim

Left Mouse Button - Shoot

R - Reload

E - Interact / Buy

+ and - on numpad - Control camera zoom

1,2,3,4,5,6,7,8,9,0 - Change gun slot

Possibly more included as an easter egg...

Credits

Me - Programming / Art / Music

GDevelop 5 -Game Engine

Piskel - Asset editor

Garageband - Make music

Font - https://somepx.itch.io/humble-fonts-gold

Some references - https://user8426.itch.io/wood-merge
